content: elevate your organization game with the alda nesting baskets crochet pattern these charming baskets are perfect for storing your yarn stash wips or crafting essentials in style the textured design adds a touch of elegance to any room while the sturdy construction ensures durability whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out this easy-level pattern will guide you through creating these versatile baskets in no time worked in the round from the bottom up these 3-dimensional baskets feature a circular design that showcases your crochet skills check the notes for all measurements and customize your baskets to fit your storage needs crafted with big twist value solids aran weight yarn and a 5mm hook these baskets are both practical and beautiful **unique features-** easy-level crochet pattern textured design adds elegance bottom-up construction worked in the round for seamless finish 3-dimensional baskets for added depth customizable sizes to fit your needs uses big twist value solids yarn for quality and durability **materials needed-** yarn big twist value solids aran weight - 20-51 yards hook 5mm us size 8 0 gauges 7 stitches x 8 row = 2 inches in single_crochet 7 stitches by 8 row = 2 in single_crochet
